name: py-docutils

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate

dependent_to.name: py-python-daemon
dependent_to.description:
Library to implement a well-behaved Unix daemon process. This library
implements the well-behaved daemon specification of PEP Standard daemon
process. A well-behaved Unix daemon process is tricky to get right, but
the required steps are much the same for every daemon program. A
DaemonContext instance holds the behaviour and configured process
environment for the program; use the instance as a context manager to
enter a daemon state.

dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf
dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.

dependent_to.name: py-readme-renderer
dependent_to.description:
readme_renderer is a library for rendering "readme" descriptions for
Warehouse.

dependent_to.name: py-recommonmark
dependent_to.description:
A docutils-compatibility bridge to CommonMark. This allows you to write
CommonMark inside of Docutils & Sphinx projects. Documentation is
available on Read the Docs: http://recommonmark.readthedocs.org

dependent_to.name: py-docutils-stubs
dependent_to.description: PEP 561 based Type information for docutils.

dependent_to.name: py-myst-parser
dependent_to.description:

flavour of Markdown for authoring technical and scientific
documentation.

dependent_to.name: py-m2r
dependent_to.description:
M2R converts a markdown file including reStructuredText (rst) markups to

dependent_to.name: py-breathe
